title: apparition
body:
“that pretty little thing could shatter your skull with her voice if someone decided to teach her how.”

prologue

She is only seven and yet her world comes crashing down at what she’s seen.From those youthful eyes, she’s watched conflicts arise and fade within the very confinements of the house she lived in. How…

Read more…

title: Archaic Kinds Of Fun
body:
What’s the most impossible job you can think of? For Jo Holbrook, The Tank, Killer Extradonaire…it’s being a bodyguard. Leave it to Fury to kick it up a notch. Now she’s playing chauffeur for Tony Stark and trying to figure out where her life went wrong. At least there’s pancakes.

For The Record

November 1, 2014DARCY“Yo, Skye! You in here?!” Darcy called out as she walked into Tony’s lab. She heard music, and she knew Tony wasn’t playing it because he was out on a date with Pepper…

Read more…

summary: AO3 - Bruce Banner x Tony Stark
title: AO3 - Bruce Banner x Tony Stark
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2mBXGRs

by AutumnalBloom

Bruce doesn’t think he’s a genius. Not because he isn’t smart, but because that comes from some positive impact on the world. Tony is determined to prove him wrong.

Words: 1982, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers - Ambiguous Fandom, Iron Man (Movies)

blog.name: chatdomestique
blog.title: Hello Stranger
blog.description:
"In spite of everything, I still believe that people are really good at heart." -Anne Frank

You can call me Chat (like my url), Cameron, or Jace (I’m still figuring things out)

Social Justice Mage | 19 | they/them | psychology major | main/personal/most active blog

If you follow me and have a trigger (or any content that you don’t want to see) message me and I’ll do my best to tag. I usually tag stuff that I feel crosses an indefinable nsfw line.

Queue is #q tea pi

I have too many side blogs:

more active

- Queer: chatinexistante
- Cuteness: chatmignon

less active

- Witchcraft: chatmagique
- ADHD/Disorders: chatdistraite
- Art/Writing: chatcreatif
- Fandom: chatfanatique

Radfems, Nazis, Trumeds, Exclusionists, Pedos, and anyone who sexualizes LGBTQ folk can fuck off.

summary:
marvel:
Tom Hiddleston is too old to play loki, we should kill his character.
me, an intellectual:
actually loki is supposed to...
body:
marvel:

Tom Hiddleston is too old to play loki, we should kill his character.

me, an intellectual:

actually loki is supposed to be a 16 years old boy but never looked like that so why’d you want to change him NOW
